page.title: 05MRS DIXON'S DAY-STANION
page.content: My name is Pauline Dixon.I am 33 years old and have been married to Melvyn Dixon for 14 years.I have 3 children Liam 9,Abbe 7 and Nina 4.I am a part time lecturer at the local technical College.{Tuesday 11 June 1985} {6.45 a.m.}My day starts with a very hectic spell getting myself and the three children ready. My husband is contracts manager for a heating company in Leicester and he leaves home before 7.30 a.m.each morning.{8.30 a.m.}time to leave; Liam and Abbe go to Stanion C of E school and Nina stays with her Grandmother who also lives in Stanion on the 2\ days a week while I am at work. {9.00 a.m.}My "working day" starts at Tresham College,Corby.My students today are young Trainees (cont.P6)
